languages.text: Владайм Токара провел шесть терранских лет в должности уборщика, а затем старшего уборщика, пока по случайности не погиб в отсеке, подвергнутом шлюзованию. Коллеги Владайма утверждали, что он не мог не знать о запланированной процедуре.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.
languages.original_text: Владайм Токара провел шесть терранских лет в должности уборщика, а затем старшего уборщика, пока по случайности не погиб в отсеке, подвергнутом шлюзованию. Коллеги Владайма утверждали, что он не мог не знать о запланированной процедуре.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran cycles holding the position of the janitor, then senior janitor, until one day he died in an accident in a compartment that got airlocked. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that it was impossible for him to not know about the planned procedure.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran cycles holding the position of the janitor, then senior janitor, until one day he died in an accident in a compartment that got airlocked. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that it was impossible for him to not know about the planned procedure.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran cycles holding the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for airlocking. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he almost certainly knew about the planned procedure.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran cycles holding the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for airlocking. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he almost certainly knew about the planned procedure.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran cycles in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran cycles in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

languages.text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉一直在船上担任清洁工。他在船上工作了六个泰拉年之后，升职成为高级清洁工。但后来有一天，他被意外困在某个预定进行减压的舱室里，不幸身亡。弗拉迪姆的同事坚称，此次减压是正常工作流程的一部分，他不可能不清楚这样的安排。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

traits.locale_text: 弗拉迪姆·托卡拉一直在船上担任清洁工。他在船上工作了六个泰拉周期之后，升职成为高级清洁工。但后来有一天，他被意外困在某个预定进行减压的舱室里，不幸身亡。弗拉迪姆的同事坚称，此次减压是正常工作流程的一部分，他不可能不清楚这样的安排。

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara arbeitete sechs terranische Jahre lang als Hausmeister, dann als leitender Hausmeister, bevor er eines Tages versehentlich in ein Modul gesperrt wurde, aus dem bald darauf der Druck abgelassen werden sollte. So starb er. Vladayms Kollegen beharrten darauf, dass er von dem geplanten Druckablass gewusst haben musste.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara arbeitete sechs terranische Zyklen lang als Hausmeister, dann als leitender Hausmeister, bevor er eines Tages versehentlich in ein Modul gesperrt wurde, in dem bald darauf die Luftschleuse geöffnet werden sollte. So starb er. Vladayms Kollegen beharrten darauf, dass er von der geplanten Schleusenöffnung gewusst haben musste.

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara travailla pendant six ans de Terra en tant que nettoyeur, puis nettoyeur en chef, avant de trouver la mort par accident lors de la dépressurisation programmée d'un compartiment. Ses collègues soutinrent qu'il devait savoir qu'une telle procédure était prévue dans ce compartiment.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara travailla pendant six cycles de Terra comme nettoyeur, puis nettoyeur en chef, avant de trouver la mort par accident dans un compartiment dépressurisé. Ses collègues soutinrent qu'il savait certainement qu'une telle procédure était prévue dans ce sas.

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara pasó seis años terranos en el puesto de conserje, y después en el de conserje veterano, antes de morir al quedar atrapado en un compartimento que iba a ser despresurizado. Los compañeros de Vladaym insistieron en que tenía que estar informado del procedimiento planificado.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara pasó seis ciclos terranos en el puesto de conserje, y después en el de conserje veterano, antes de morir al quedar atrapado en un compartimento que iba a ser presurizado. Los compañeros de Vladaym insistieron en que estaba informado del procedimiento.

languages.text: ヴラダイム・トカラは6地球年を清掃員、次いで上級清掃員として過ごしたが、ある日、減圧が予定されていた区画に誤ってはまり込んで死亡した。ヴラダイムの同僚たちは、彼がその予定されていた処置を知っていたに違いないと主張した。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

traits.locale_text: ヴラダイム・トカラは6地球年を清掃員、次いで上級清掃員として過ごしたが、ある日、減圧が予定されていた区画に誤ってはまり込んで死亡した。ヴラダイムの同僚たちは、彼がその予定されていた処置を知っていたに違いないと主張した。

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara önce hademelik görevinde, ardından da baş hademelik görevinde altışar Terra yılı geçirdi. Bir gün basınç değişimi yapılması planlanan bir kompartımanda yanlışlıkla kilitli kalarak hayatını kaybetti. Vladaym'ın meslektaşları, planlanan prosedürü bilmemesine imkân olmadığı konusunda ısrarcıydı.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara spent six Terran years in the position of janitor, and then senior janitor, before one day dying after accidentally getting stuck in a compartment scheduled for decompression. Vladaym's coworkers insisted that he would have definitely known about the planned procedure.

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara önce hademelik görevinde, ardından da baş hademelik görevinde altışar Terra yılı geçirdi. Bir gün basınç değişimi yapılması planlanan bir kompartımanda yanlışlıkla kilitli kalarak hayatını kaybetti. Vladaym'ın meslektaşları, planlanan prosedürü bilmemesine imkân olmadığı konusunda ısrarcıydı.
